name: Legends of Exidia
description: An army of demons, the Morgost, has invaded Exidia. They have defeated Princess Sofia and captured the Orb of Spell. Their intentions are dark: the resurrection of the almighty Daraka. Listen only to your courage and help Sofia drive back this threat. As a fearless warrior, you’ll fight the most evil creatures and, with every quest, you’ll get closer to discovering the source of the plague.
